text: Apollo 13 is a 1995 drama movie about the failed Apollo 13 mission. It was directed by Ron Howard, and starred Tom Hanks. It won 2 Academy Awards in 1996. ==Other websites== * * Category:1995 adventure movies Category:1995 drama movies Category:1990s historical movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American drama movies Category:Best Picture Oscar Category:English-language movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Ron Howard Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies about astronauts Category:Movies set in the 1970s
title: Apollo 13 (movie)
